concept.title: Example: Fallback information for multimedia
concept.shortdesc: In this scenario, fallback content is provided for systems that cannot display multimedia content.

conbody.p: The referenced video provides an image as fallback. If a system support video display, it will display the image video-not-available.png, which specifies its own alternate text.

fig.title: Reference to a video with fallback content
fig.codeblock: <video height="300px" loop="false" muted="false" poster="demo1-video-poster" width="400px"> <desc>A video illustrating this procedure.</desc> <fallback> <image href="video-not-available.png"> <alt>This video cannot be displayed.</alt> </image> </fallback> <media-source href="video.mp4" format="video/mp4"/> </video>
